full_summary:
# Trade Commissioner Service - Digital Evolution Project

**Tender Information**

|  | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Title** | Trade Commissioner Service Digital Evolution Project | Projet d'évolution numérique du Service des délégués commerciaux |
| **Reference Number** | PW-23-01022884 |  |
| **Amendment Number** | 0 |  |
| **Solicitation Number** | 23-226656/A |  |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-01-24 | 2023-01-24 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-02-20T13:00:00 | 2023-02-20 à 14:00 |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Selective Tendering | Concurrentielle - Appel d'offres sélectif |

**Contract Details**

|  | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **G SIN** | D302A - Informatics Professional Services | D302A - Services professionnels en informatique |
| **Estimated Quantity** | Up to 220 days | Jusqu'à 220 jours |
| **Contract Duration** | Initial contract period: Contract award to April 03, 2025 (with 2 x 1-year option periods) | Période initiale du contrat : Attribution du contrat au 3 avril 2025 (avec 2 x 1 an option périodes) |

**Conditions**

* Tendering procedure: Selective Tendering
* Anticipated start date: As soon as possible
* Delivery dates: (2023-04-03) to (2025-04-03)
* Trade agreements applicable: Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and more
* Regular refresh cycles: Quarterly

**Contacting the Contractor**

To inquire about the tender details, contact the Contractor:

* Kingsley Knight, Contracting Authority
* Email: Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-203-8234

**Submission Guidelines**

To be eligible to submit a bid, bidders must be a holder of the Supply Arrangement under EN578 – 170432/B.

The tender documents will be distributed through email only to the invited bidders. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.
